biotools.summary: clusTCR is a Python interface for rapid clustering of large sets of CDR3 sequences. It is a two-step clustering approach that combines the speed of the Faiss Clustering Library with the accuracy of Markov Clustering Algorithm.

bioschemas.name: clusTCR
bioschemas.summary: clusTCR is a Python interface for rapid clustering of large sets of CDR3 sequences. It is a two-step clustering approach that combines the speed of the Faiss Clustering Library with the accuracy of Markov Clustering Algorithm.
